name: wapy-dev
description: wapy.dev is a self-hosted interface for exploring Python packages and documentation, providing search, metadata views, and examples through a lightweight web UI.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find Python packages with fast search across PyPI's extensive package repository

features.title: REST API
features.description: Browse package documentation, README files, and API references in a clean interface

features.title: Code Examples
features.description: Access usage examples and code snippets directly from package documentation for quick reference

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Cache frequently accessed packages and documentation for offline development environments
